name: Refried Bean Roll-Ups--Lighter Recipe
author: Old El Paso
summary: Lighten up!  You can enjoy great-tasting seasoned refried beans, lettuce and cheese in soft flour tortillas and still keep an eye on the fat.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) can Old El Paso® fat-free refried beans
½ cup Old El Paso® Thick 'n Chunky salsa
8  fat free flour tortillas (8 to10 inch)
½ cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese
directions: In 1-quart saucepan, heat beans, salsa and chili powder over medium heat about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until warm
Spoon about 1/4 cup bean mixture onto center of each tortilla; spread slightly
Serve with additional salsa if desired
